_header: Blithe Aberdeen thow beryl of all touns
_description: William Dunbar, ‘The Queinis Reception at Aberdein’, A.D. 1511 — nine 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Be blyth and blisfull burcht of Aberdein’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Blyth aberdeane thow beriall of all tounisThe lamp of bewtie
                    bountie & blythnes…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Thairfoir sa lang as quein thow beiris crounBe thankfull to
                    þis burcht of ab[er]d[ein]
